original_title: มหัศจรรย์...พันธุ์รัก
overview: Max is an art director for a trendy fashion magazine and is in love with Sandy, however is heart-broken when he sees her with a foreigner. He obtains the gift of reading other’s thoughts enabling him to see their dreams and wishes. Still heart-broken, he takes his niece to the paediatrician where he meets Pim. It is love at first sight, but Pim is promised to the adulterous Dr. Watchara….
title: Be True
